attributes.action: Change The New Offical Olympic Logo
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The new olympic announced today is terrible! I can hardly read it! I read the new logo cost over £500,000 to design! What was wrong with the original logo that we used when we were bidding? It was much much much better!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
